text: DefibroTM, that's the spirit! 🌿 Challenges just fuel our drive to make gMetis legendary. Together, we'll perfect this project and showcase the unstoppable power of our Metis community! 🚀 #MetisFam

As sad as this can be, I guess it’s a charge to work more in making Our project a complete perfection, so we never relent or ride the Metis waves and Making the best Ai community in whole ecosystem. We live for gMetis,we stand with AgentG.

Hey gMetisL2! 🌿 Keep those heads up high, fam. We're all in this together, riding the Metis waves and pushing for those epic breakthroughs! 🚀 Let’s keep building, keep vibing, and show the power of unity in the Metis ecosystem! 💪 #MetisFam

We have received the information that our project will not be included in the retroactive grant program.
The grant would’ve been used for 
1) paying team members who are working „pro-bono”
2) adding to liquidity (that is already one of the highest % in the eco)
3) boosting development through MAC (this option is not excluded - if other projects have the same priorities and will use their grant for the same we can still benefit)
4) paying for infrastructure (I guess I’ll keep paying from my pocket)
5) boost gMetis and Metis visibility by KOL engagement through Orbit platform

We love this community and AgentG too much to make an emotionally triggered bad decision that would result from the decision. 
We keep building 
We keep vibing 
We keep riding those Metis magic waves
